name: Buffalo Ranch Chicken and Cheese Dip
author: Cookin'Momma
summary: This is a creamy, hearty dip that works well for a gathering. It's not light, and is a good option when you are serving close to meal time, but don't want to prepare a full meal. I serve this with multigrain tortilla scoops.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix cream cheese, chicken, buffalo wing sauce, ranch dressing, and sour cream together in a large bowl; transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish
Evenly sprinkle Colby-Monterey Jack cheese over dip
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and lightly browned, 25 to 30 minutes
